GR14ss4_krsu:1: [There are several different editions of the Kṛṣṇa-sandarbha. The Bengali
GR14ss4_krsu:2: edition appears to be earlier than the Vrindavan edition published by Haridas
GR14ss4_krsu:3: Shastri in 1983. The additions found in the Vṛ edition are probably authentic,
GR14ss4_krsu:4: as there is clear evidence Jiva Goswami made extensive corrections and
GR14ss4_krsu:5: emendations in some of his books after they were sent to Bengal with Srinivas

GR14ss4_krsu:7581: itarasyāś ca tasya sadā dvitīyāyāḥ śrī-rādhāyā eva /
GR14ss4_krsu:7583: rasasya janma prādurbhāvaḥ yāv evādi-rasa-vidyāyāḥ parama-nidhānam ity
GR14ss4_krsu:7588: ataeva sarvatopy āścarya-rūpayos tayor varṇane mama tat-kṛpaiva sāmagrīty
GR14ss4_krsu:7589: āha ādi-kavaye prathamaṃ tal-līlā-varṇanam ārabhamāṇāya mahyaṃ śrī-
GR14ss4_krsu:7592: ārambha-sama-kālam eva yugapat sarvam idaṃ mahā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7593: purāṇaṃ mama hṛdi prakāśitavān ity arthaḥ /
GR14ss4_krsu:7595: vyaktam / yad yasyāṃ ca sūrayaḥ śeṣādayo'pi muhyanti svarūpa-saundarya-
GR14ss4_krsu:7596: guṇādibhiḥ atyadbhutā keyam iti nirvaktum ārabdhā niśetuṃ na śaknuvanti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7597: evaṃ bhūtvā sā yadi kṛpāṃ nākariṣyat tadā labdha-mādhava-tādṛśa-
GR14ss4_krsu:7601: ity ādinā tasyā līlā-varṇana-leśo'pi sāhasa-siddhir asau nābhaviṣyad eveti
GR14ss4_krsu:7602: bhāvaḥ / tayor āścarya-rūpatvam eva vyanakti tejo-vāri-mṛdāṃ caitanyānām
GR14ss4_krsu:7603: api yathā yena prakāreṇa vinimayaḥ parasparaṃ svabhāva-viparyayor bhavati
GR14ss4_krsu:7613: ujjvalatā-prāptir vaṃśī-vādyādinā vārivac ca dravatā-prāptir iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7614: tad etat sarvaṃ tasya līlā-varṇane prasiddham eva /
GR14ss4_krsu:7620: nāyikā-rūpa-tri-bhedānāṃ sarvāsām api vraja-devīnām eva prādurbhāvo vā
GR14ss4_krsu:7622: yasyāḥ saundaryādi-guṇa-sampadā tās tāḥ kṛṣṇasya na
GR14ss4_krsu:7627: vā paraspara-bhinnatāṃ gatayor aikyenaiva vivakṣitaṃ tad iti / ataeva
GR14ss4_krsu:7630: svena dhāmnā sva-sva-prabhāvena sadā nirastaṃ sva-līlā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7635: vilāsādibhir anavaratam ānanda-sandoha-dāne kṛta-satyam iva jātam / tatra
GR14ss4_krsu:7640: vācakatayā vākyato niridiṣṭa ity ubhaya-sādṛśyāvagamāt prativastūpamā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7642: iyaṃ ca muhur upamiti-mālā-prativastūpamā / tena tais
GR14ss4_krsu:7643: tair guṇair mitho yogyatayā nibaddhatvāt samanāmāpi /
GR14ss4_krsu:7645: aho parasparaṃ parasmāt param api tan-mithuna-bhūtaṃ kim api tattvaṃ mitho
GR14ss4_krsu:7646: guṇa-gaṇa-mādhurībhiḥ samatām eva samavāptam iti sakala-jīva-jīvātur-
GR14ss4_krsu:7648: vilāsaṃ na rocayatīti svataḥ sambhavi vastu vyajyate / tad āhuḥ -
GR14ss4_krsu:7650: eko'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak // [SāhD 10.49] iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7652: evaṃ samaṃ syād ānurūpyeṇa ślāghā yogyasya
GR14ss4_krsu:7654: tathā vastu vālaṅkṛtir vāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ / kaveḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:7658: tad uktaṃ śrutyā - rādhayā mādhavo devaḥ ity ādinā /
GR14ss4_krsu:7661: aham eva paraṃ rūpaṃ nānyo jānāti kaścana /
GR14ss4_krsu:7662: jānāti rādhikā pārtha aṃśān arcanti devatāḥ // iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7663: tayor nitya-vilāsas tv itthaṃ yathā varṇito'smad-upajīvya-caraṇāmbujaiḥ --
GR14ss4_krsu:7667: kaiśoraṃ saphalī-karoti kalayan kuñje vihāraṃ hariḥ // iti [BRS 2.1.231] /
GR14ss4_krsu:7672: tad uktaṃ śrutyā rādhayā mādhavo deva iti / etad-
GR14ss4_krsu:7673: artham eva vyatāniṣamimāḥ sarvā api paripāṭīr iti pūrṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GR14ss4_krsu:7685: [*ENDNOTE #1] ... ition does not have the second and fourth lines of the
GR14ss4_krsu:7688: sa hi satyam ṛtaṃ caiva pavitraṃ puṇyam eva ca
GR14ss4_krsu:7689: śāśvataṃ brahma paramaṃ dhruvaṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam
GR14ss4_krsu:7690: [*ENDNOTE #3] This portion up to the end of the paragraph is mostly
GR14ss4_krsu:7692: [*ENDNOTE #4] The second line is not found.
GR14ss4_krsu:7693: [*ENDNOTE #5] 109.53 in the critical edition. The line reads there:
GR14ss4_krsu:7695: [*ENDNOTE #6] The V. edition has kūrma-purāṇe vyāsa-gītāyāṃ sad-
GR14ss4_krsu:7696: ācāra-prasaṅge pativratā-māhātmye. Chatterjee quotes the following verse
GR14ss4_krsu:7697: from Agni Purana - sītayā rādhito vahniś chāyā-sītām ajījanat /
